title: New: IYES – Crazy In Love (Beyoncé Cover)
content:
Photo:Kenny Mc Cracken

In possibly the second biggest Beyoncé related news of the day (she has a new album out, apparently…), Brighton duo IYES have tried their hand at covering her 2003 hit Crazy In Love.

Stripping back some of the sass and replacing it with a piano section and a gorgeously layered sensuality. Having impressed with their live performances this year, and with their debut single ‘Til Infinity one of the most blogged about tracks of the year, 2014 is shaping up rather nicely for IYES. Check out Crazy In Love below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
